short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of a glacial landscape.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features a breathtaking view of snow-capped mountains and a peaceful expanse of icy water, where floating icebergs reflect the calm sky. The gentle blend of white snow and dark rock formations provides a balanced and soothing visual experience, perfect for those who enjoy the quiet grandeur of nature.

Key features:
- Beautiful Glacier background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
